backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing worker CRUD, attendance recording by date, monthly attendance queries, and per‑principal passcode storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend attendance‑selector fixes with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions covering pages, components, hooks, utils, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes with global background and typography rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, app layout with navigation, lock‑screen gating, footer, and toast provider.
frontend/src/components/AttendanceCellSe: Dialog for selecting attendance status that calls setAttendance and shows status‑specific toast messages.
frontend/src/components/AttendanceGrid.t: Monthly attendance table rendering workers vs. days with color‑coded cells and a selector dialog for marking attendance.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyWorkerSum: Displays a table summarizing each worker’s attendance and payroll for a given month using attendance data and payroll calculation.
frontend/src/components/MonthSidebar.tsx: Sidebar UI to select year and month with navigation buttons and dropdowns, updating parent via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with links, icons, and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/WorkerFormDialog: Modal form for creating or editing a worker, handling validation, saving, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLock.ts: Manages passcode-based app locking using the backend actor and localStorage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Provides attendance fetching, setting, clearing, and per-worker attendance mapping for a given month.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing identity state.
React hook that fetches attendance in a date range and calculates payroll totals for a worker.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkers.ts: Provides React Query hooks to load, create, update, and delete workers with backend integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and attendance color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: UI for selecting a worker and date range to compute wages using payroll calculator hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Attendance calendar page showing monthly grids and worker summaries with selectable month and year.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with navigation cards for calendar, worker management, and a quick attendance guide.
frontend/src/pages/LockScreenPage.tsx: Lock screen requiring a passcode to unlock the app, using useAppLock and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: UI page for enabling app lock, managing passcodes, and showing a passcode setup dialog with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/WorkersPage.tsx: Displays and manages the worker list, including add, edit, and delete actions with dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Utility functions for listing months between dates, formatting dates, and parsing date strings.
frontend/src/utils/payroll.ts: Calculates payroll totals from attendance records using full, half, and morning-evening day rules and daily wage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented feature requirements.
